title: How much download does an update take?
body:
Hey guys, 

Just out of pure curiosity i was wondering how much an update of league of legends (5.4 to be specific) would take?? Super pumped for this {{champion:37}} skin!! ( my wallet isn't though {{item:3070}} )

replies.body:
LOL RIOt troll me i got to update the patch 2 times when i log out...............
{{item:3070}}
most updates usually round the 200-300mb mark
